title: Shopping Centre / Market - Shopping, vegetable market, hawkers place etc
clause_text: Shopping Centre / Market - Shopping, vegetable market, hawkers place etc. and departmental stores, offices, banks / community hall on upper floors.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS
